edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.checkers.layout

Interface Layout

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlignLayout, Button, CurrentTurn, Gameboard, GridLayout, InsetLayout, Label, MainView, Piece, StackLayout, Tile, Toolbar, View

    public interface Layout
    Interface that must be conformed to in order to layout any view

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • renderWithSize

        void renderWithSize(java.awt.Dimension size,
                    java.awt.Point location)
        Calculates Child Size and Position based on Alignment, parent size and child size
        Parameters:
        size - - Size of parent
        location - - X,Y layout position of parent

        Gets Size of layout
        Returns:
        size - Dimensions of layout

      • getDisplaySize

        java.awt.Dimension getDisplaySize(java.awt.Dimension size,
                                  java.awt.Point location)
        Conforms to Layout Interface. Doesn't have a fixed layout size.
        Parameters:
        size - - Size of parent
        location - - X,Y layout position of parent
        Returns:
        size - Fixed size of layout, otherwise null if not fixed.

      • setSize

        void setSize(int width,
             int height)
        Set size of layout
        Parameters:
        width - - Width of layout
        height - - Height of layout

      • setLocation

        void setLocation(int x,
                 int y)
        Set position of layout
        Parameters:
        x - - X position of layout
        y - - Y position of layout

      • getLocation

        java.awt.Point getLocation()
        Getter for Layout position
        Returns:
        position - Point of x,y coordinates
